title: LEAGUE DOWNLOAD TAKING FOREVER
body:
Good evening,

Recently i had to delete LOL completely, and i tried to download it again. It has never ever took this long before. i started at 3:30 it's 8:30, and it's Applying patches at 59%, before it would jump from one number to 100% now it's taking forever for it to just go up one percentage.

A couple of things

- I'm using Ethernet connection
- I have over 100 download speed
- First time this has ever happened
- Usually finishes around 30 minutes regularly  {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: The patching process can vary depending on each PC and size of the patch.  Some of the biggest factors are not just connection, but even the speed at which your hard drive can write files.  As long as you're not getting any errors, I suggest letting it process or else it could re-scan everything for corrupt files.  If your download rate seems exceedingly slow, you can check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and strengthen your connection.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some of your settings including firewalls.  Hopefully, this helps you out!
Problem Fixed. I turned the peer to peer off, no idea how that helped, but i did it and restarted my computer. The whole download finished in 10 minutes.
